lines.text: I was thinking, what if this is all a movie that I'm making? What if you're all actors in a movie that I'm making? Then what? What if the camera's there? There. Does that make this less real?
Heisenberg said that one particle can be in two places at one time.
So you and I can be in two places at one time? Venice and Venice? Past and future. Movies and real life. It's all possible.
